scripts.devStart: npx copyfiles src/settings/dev/* -f src && start http-server --proxy http://localhost:8080/index.html? -d false && start npx babel --watch src/components --out-dir src/jsx/components --presets react-app/prod
scripts.localBuild: npx copyfiles src/settings/azure/* -f src && npx webpack --config webpack.config.azure.js && start http-server dist
scripts.dockerPush: npx copyfiles src/settings/azure/* -f src && npx webpack --config webpack.config.azure.js && docker build --tag mp1011/recipeapp:latest . && docker push mp1011/recipeapp:latest
scripts.dockerPushTest: npx copyfiles src/settings/azure/* -f src && npx webpack --config webpack.config.azure.js && docker build --tag mp1011/recipeapp:test . && docker push mp1011/recipeapp:test
